name: Shapechanger's Gift
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Wilderness © 2017, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, M (a piece of the creature whose form you plan to grant)
text:
You change the target into an animal (as per beast shape I), humanoid (as per alter self), or monstrous humanoid (as per monstrous physique I).

The chosen form can't have a fly speed. The subject's statistics change as per the appropriate spell except the creature's ability scores and natural armor do not change. The creature can change between its natural form and the chosen form at will as a standard action.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（来自你想要变形的生物的一部分）
text_zh: 你把目标变成动物（如同野兽形态 I），类人生物（如同变身术），或者类人怪物（如同类人形态 I）。所选的形态不能有飞行速度。受术者的数据会如同适当的法术一般发生变化，但生物的属性值和天生护甲不会改变。生物可以在他的自然形态和被选择的形态之间改变，这是一个标准动作。
